edu.packt.neuralnet.chart

Class Chart

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.packt.neuralnet.chart.Chart

  • public class Chart
extends java.lang.Object
    Chart This class allows create and manipulate charts. It is based in JFreeChart library (www.jfree.org/jfreechart/)
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Alan de Souza, Fabio Soares
